title: Drawing, "Design for a Stage Set: Temples on a River Bank", 1800–25
medium: Pen and sepia  and brush work and pencil on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle. Group of temple buildings with porticoes on river side. Unfinished.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Stage Set: Temples on a River Bank", 1800–25.
1800–25. Pen and sepia  and brush work and pencil on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-235.
